resources.string: Mall Discoverer
Hello blank fragment
Persiaran TRX, Tun Razak Exchange, 55188 Kuala Lumpur, Wilayah Persekutuan Kuala Lumpur
MRT Kajang Line: Tun Razak Exchange station\nMRT Putrajaya Line: Tun Razak Exchange station

The Exchange TRX is a world-class experiential lifestyle destination that sits at the heart of Tun Razak Exchange, Kuala Lumpur\'s international financial district. With over 400 of the world\'s leading retailers, The Exchange TRX blends together an immersive retail journey together with the beauty of nature through the 10-acre TRX City Park. Discover retail reimagined at The Exchange TRX.
Saint Laurent, Giorgio Armani, Crossover, FENDI, Nose, Dolce & Gabbana, Valentino, Berluti, Cartier, Louis Vuitton
https://www.theexchange.my/
https://maps.app.goo.gl/k5MsqZdAEHtqp3ZM8
168, Jln Bukit Bintang, Bukit Bintang, 55100 Kuala Lumpur, Wilayah Persekutuan Kuala Lumpur
MRT Kajang Line: Bukit Bintang station\nMonorail Line: Bukit Bintang station
Award-winning shopping destination with over 700 retail outlets and restaurants. Check out our complete list of Stores, Offers, Events, and latest updates
Dior, Chanel, Louis Vuitton, Emporio Armani, Gucci, Machines, Sephora, Bateleur, Fossil, ZARA, Zegna, Jimmy Choo, Bulgari
https://www.pavilion-kl.com/
https://maps.app.goo.gl/5fL9WaG89iszqYMi9
241, Petronas Twin Tower, Kuala Lumpur City Centre, 50088 Kuala Lumpur, Wilayah Persekutuan Kuala Lumpur
LRT Kelana Jaya Line: KLCC station
A premier shopping mall with exclusive access to top-tier brands. Experience the wonders of Suria KLCC with your loved ones. Located In City Centre. Petronas Twin Towers.
Hublot, Balenciaga, Bally, Boss, Bottega Veneta, Coach, Gucci, Prada, Versace, Kenzo, Longchamp, MCM, Michael Kors, POLO
https://www.suriaklcc.com.my/
https://maps.app.goo.gl/MsQxpKdRUPNdKVPYA
Lingkaran Syed Putra, Mid Valley City, 59200 Kuala Lumpur, Wilayah Persekutuan Kuala Lumpur
KTM Seremban Line: MidValley station\nLRT Kelana Jaya Line: Abdullah Hukum station\nKTM Port Klang Line: Abdullah Hukum station

Located strategically in the city of Kuala Lumpur, Mid Valley Megamall is a shopping mall surrounded with hotels and offices and is conveniently accessible by a myriad of transportation options, making it a one-stop hub for shoppers, tourists, and business travelers alike.
Crossover, Nitori, Harvey Norman, FABSPY, Kipling, Swarovski, Timberland, Topshop, Zara, Padini, Elianto, Lancome
https://www.midvalley.com.my/
https://maps.app.goo.gl/3EaGSxd84aqXi8tv6
Unit T2–3A-3 & Unit T2-3A-3A Level 3A, IOI City Tower Two, Lbh IRC, Ioi Resort, 62502 Putrajaya, Selangor
(none)
The multi award-winning IOI City Mall, located within IOI Resort City, is the largest mall in Southern Klang Valley. It is easily accessible via major highways and public transport.
BELLE, UNIQLO, Playboy, G200, H&M, Dragon Silver, PANDORA, Lovisa, Tomei, HABIB, Dyson, Adidas, Bonia, Drum, Giordano, Hackett London
https://www.ioimp.com.my/home/
https://maps.app.goo.gl/8mK3WE2DM2RJLfMW6
1, Lebuh Bandar Utama, Bandar Utama, 47800 Petaling Jaya, Selangor
MRT Kajang Line: Bandar Utama station\nLRT Shah Alam Line: Bandar Utama station
1 Utama, proudly ranked amongst the world’s largest malls with over 750 stores to shop-eat-play!
Nike, PUMA, Lacoste, Levi\'s, Skechers, Vincci, Pedro, Tomei, Machines, HP Concept Store, Bega, Calvin Klein, F.O.S
https://www.1utama.com.my/
https://maps.app.goo.gl/LZJgxPP61P7htkQQ7
1, Jln Imbi, Bukit Bintang, 55100 Kuala Lumpur, Wilayah Persekutuan Kuala Lumpur
Monorail Line: Imbi station
Home to over 1,000 retail shops ranging from fashions, F&B, entertainments, beauty, tech, knick-knacks and many more. Find your favourite store.

https://maps.app.goo.gl/NnyqKzbyaXpwW9dE7
3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Petaling Jaya, Selangor
BRT Sunway Line: Sunway Lagoon station
Sunway Pyramid is your Unique Lifestyle Adventure Shopping Mall with more than 1000 retailers waiting for you to shop, eat, relax and enjoy right here.
H&M, Zara, Uniqlo, Mango, Miu Miu, Sephora, L\'Occitane, MAC, Bobbi Brown, The Body Shop, Samsung, Senheng, Muji
https://www.sunwaypyramid.com/
https://maps.app.goo.gl/mWe6aHsUzgKUP4C46
181, Jln Bukit Bintang, Bukit Bintang, 55100 Kuala Lumpur, Wilayah Persekutuan Kuala Lumpur
MRT Kajang Line: Bukit Bintang station\nMonorail Line: Bukit Bintang station
A new visionary monument of modern luxury in Kuala Lumpur offering the best of experiential retail in an intimate boutique environment that exudes elegance and sophistication.
Apollo, Rolex, Okaju, Louis Vuitton, Jogoya, GIBSON, Davidoff, Bedat & Co, Balmain, Trove, Audemars Piguet, The Alchemy

Lingkaran Syed Putra, Mid Valley City, 59200 Kuala Lumpur, Wilayah Persekutuan Kuala Lumpur
LRT Kelana Jaya Line: Abdullah Hukum station\nKTM Port Klang Line: Abdullah Hukum station\nKTM Seremban Line: MidValley station

Located at the heart of Mid Valley City is The Gardens Mall; a premium 6-level shopping haven for more than 200 outlets where top fashion brands such as Louis Vuitton, Hermès, Cartier, Tiffany & Co., and Burberry reside.
https://www.thegardensmall.com.my/
https://maps.app.goo.gl/t2K6QmRAdnifqm6z9
